column5: Had a look at the cottage today. Gannon Narrows open 1 km either side of bridge. Pigeon is 2-3 ft lower than average in summer. Not a lot of snow around. Is there much snow left in Haliburton? Slow melt this year. Likely no flooding.
I was in Bridgenorth today and it's starting to open at the east side of the causeway

Lower Buckhorn web cam showing break-up of ice http://www.reachharbour.com/weather.htm  and another cam looking down Lower Buckhorn below the dam http://www.sunriseresort.ca/index.php/photo-video/webcam  Kawartha Kev
